title: 3rd day in a row no rioter response or support response on bug.
body:
was playing a game the riven got top i was mid asked to switch in pre game lobby and she said sure, when she said she was going to riven mid i said nevermind and that i would go mid. woe and behold we get into the game and she goes mid i tell her to go top she says no so i go top instead. she dies to the enemy lissandra and we then get the option to /remake it passes 2 votes for it and 3 votes against it, meaning all 5 of us voted and were present in the game. in the post game lobby i was the one to lose LP yet no one else on my team did or my duo buddy who was adc. apparently if you dc for just a fraction of a second at the beginning of a game like i did and reconnect instantly it still punishes you. to elaborate, i spawned in my champ walked to the center of the platform, i bought my items the barrier fell and thats when i walked to mid asked to switch she said no then i went top and we remade the game. aka unjustifiable loss of LP.


also i still  dont have riot kayle skin.

replies.body:
I looked into this, and it appears you may have been inactive during the match. The /Remake system marks any player who is inactive or does not take action during the first 3 minutes of the match. If anyone is marked by the system, a remake becomes available at 3:00 and if the vote passes, the marked players will receive a loss penalty.

For more information on this system, check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ). Regarding your missing Riot Kayle, reach out to us via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll assist you further with that. Let me know if you have any other questions.

could you check the chat logs for the game if you look you can clearly see I wasn't inactive. I even voted on the remake I dont know if you can see the post game chat but our jungler was wondering how the vote passed 2-3, also since I did leave base and was top before minions spawns i'd reckon that counts as activity.

Since you have specific questions about this match, I recommend reaching out to our specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any issues submitting that ticket.
well i already did before i made this post its been four days no response on either of my tickets.

Whoops, I had forgotten you had already submitted a ticket about the match, my b. 

As for your tickets, there's definitely a bit of a delay in responses at the moment due to a ton of tickets we've had submitted to us recently. We'll have a specialist get back to you as soon as possible, I appreciate your patience so far.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Games can only be remade if someone disconnects. So if you were the one to disconnect then you will be punished.

thats the thing I didnt disconnect, i bought items pretty much instantly when the blue barrier fell preventing es from leaving spawn i left with my team asked the riven to go top she said no, so i went top she died we got offered to remake and it passed 2 votes for ( i voted yes) and 3 votes to not remake then game ended and I lost lp i didnt dc at all through the entire match. when my champion walked to the center of the fountain as if i dced was literally at game spawn for a split second and i literally just moved right afterwards with no issue and was talking didnt have the reconnect thing flash at all.
